about_the_game:
Project Crypt is an action-adventure horror game inspired by critically-acclaimed horror titles such as Cry of Fear. You play as a disturbed young individual trying to find a way out of a city filled with horrific enemies. Find out the truth of your past and make it out to safety alive!

Project Crypt is a game built on GZDoom, featuring action-packed combat encounters and creepy atmospheric areas in a variety of different environments. This world is a hostile place, so you will have to be careful, with managing your ammo supply and constantly be on the lookout for your health.

Photosensitivity warning: This video game contains scenes with flashing and flickering lights that may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy.

Key Features:

  • Extensive single-player campaign
  • Multiple outcomes of the story depending on your actions in the game
  • Moody soundtrack to enhance the atmosphere
  • Robust inventory system to enhance the gameplay
  • A new survival-horror experience
  • Nostalgic visual style echoing back to the early 2000s

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of violence, blood, and crude language.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra 10.12
  • Processor: 1.4GHz Intel Core 2 Duo processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 320M
  • Storage: 1250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra 10.12
  • Processor: 1.4GHz Intel Core 2 Duo processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 320M
  • Storage: 1250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Project Crypt

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.1 GHz (Intel Pentium P6200)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel G41 Express Chipset (1 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit Executable (Performance version)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.1 GHz (Intel Core2 Duo E8400)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTS 450 (1 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit Executable (Fidelity version)

short_description: Project Crypt: The horror adventure about escaping a city overrun by monsters.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
